subject: Basketball
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: The market for Jason Collins, who came out in April, seems to have shrunk, partly because of his modest career statistics, his veteran’s salary and the N.B.A.’s luxury tax threshold.
snippet: The market for Jason Collins, who came out in April, seems to have shrunk, partly because of his modest career statistics, his veteran’s salary and the N.B.A.’s luxury tax threshold.
